abstract: Carl C. Icahn withdrew his challenge to Clorox’s board, admitting in a securities filing that his slate of director candidates had not drawn enough shareholder support.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn withdrew his challenge to Clorox’s board, admitting in a securities filing that his slate of director candidates had not drawn enough shareholder support.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has cut short his effort to replace the board at Clorox, he disclosed in a securities filing on Friday, after failing to win enough support from other shareholders.

headline.main: Icahn Withdraws From Proxy Fight at Clorox

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
